title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.7 - Subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.7 - Subject matter list

State Regulations
(a) The records
access officer shall maintain a reasonably detailed, current list of all
records in the commission's possession which are publicly available and those
records which, pursuant to law are unavailable. (b) The list shall be sufficiently detailed
to permit identification of the category of the record
sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
700.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
